titleStmt.title: The representation of the case of Sir John Lenthall, Knight, in his late sufferings
titleStmt.author: Lenthall, John, Sir, Knight.

notesStmt.note: Errors in paging: pages 38, 39, and 41 numbered 36, 40, and 37 respectively.
Imperfect: cropped, and with print show-through, with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
